mapper.select: select postCommentNo, parentsCommentNo, A.memNo, A.boardNo, postCommentDepth, postCommentLevelNo, postCommentContext, postCommentRegisterDatetime, M.memId from postComment A inner join mem M on A.memNo = M.memNo inner join board B on A.boardNo = B.boardNo where B.boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into postComment(postCommentNo, parentsCommentNo, memNo, boardNo, postCommentDepth, postCommentLevelNo, postCommentContext, postCommentRegisterDatetime) values (#{postCommentNo}, #{parentsCommentNo}, #{memNo}, #{boardNo}, #{postCommentDepth}, #{postCommentLevelNo}, #{postCommentContext}, now())
mapper.update: update postComment set postCommentContext = #{postCommentContext} where postCommentNo = #{postCommentNo}
mapper.select: select M.memId from postComment A inner join mem M on A.memNo = M.memNo where A.postCommentNo = ${postCommentNo}
